name: Mǐ Mǔ Mǐ Mǔ Hā
summary:
“Mǐ Mǔ Mǐ Mǔ Hā” is a life simulation game with a forward-thinking spirit.
In a dream world where loneliness is forbidden, you can pilot your steam-powered flying house to visit friends, or explore themed floating islands alongside your adorable companion, the Mimu. On your very own island, cute Mimus will help you farm, gather, and fish. Enjoy limitless island customization—decorate, build, and share to earn likes and compliments! Host lively parties with friends and experience a wonderfully relaxing, joy-filled life beyond imagination.
